OFFERS CLOSING WEDNESDAY 5TH AUGUST AT 5.00 PM
A lifestyle property with the lot, this sprawling 6-bedroom residence presents a life of luxury and seclusion, in a 5-star location that reaches the area's finest schools and amenities on foot.
Fronted by a rendered facade and freshly planted gardens, it has an expansive single-level floorplan that has been effortlessly extended and renovated to accommodate an expanding family.
A superior level of comfort is supplied from the outset, where six robed bedrooms (two with built-in study desks) are serviced by three lavish floor-to-ceiling tiled bathrooms with single or dual-basin stone-top vanities.
Expertly zoned for relaxation, recreation and entertaining, it showcases connecting family and rumpus rooms with twin skylights and Velux blinds, complemented by an open plan kitchen, living and dining domain with a wood log fireplace. Exquisitely appointed, the kitchen contains dual Miele ovens (one pyrolytic), a 900mm Miele gas stove with wok burner, a Miele dishwasher, Qasair rangehood, soft close drawers, metallic glass splashbacks, an auto-lit butler's pantry, Zip HydroTap (hot, cold and sparking water) plus a quartz stone waterfall-edge breakfast bar.
Flaunting an enviable indoor-outdoor flow, a large sliding stacker door opens to a covered all-seasons entertaining domain, featuring lighting, dual ceiling fans, a stacked-stone-wrapped fireplace, outdoor kitchen with a sink and 4-burner barbeque plus a Ziptrack blind.
The surrounding low-maintenance gardens form a tranquil backdrop to unwind, hosting a solar-heated swimming pool and cubby house for () family fun.
Offering something for the tradesman or car enthusiast, it boasts an internal-access remote 4-car garage with a second laundry, toilet, storage, a wood log fireplace and rear roll-through, supplemented by a gated side parking area that will easily accommodate a trailer or leisure vehicle.
A long list of quality extras add further allure, including a laundry that doubles as a drying room, dual ducted heating and evaporative cooling systems, an alarm, dual garden and firewood sheds, a 10,000L water tank, sprinklers plus liberal amounts of storage throughout.
Feature-packaged and positioned to please, this lavish family property rests within walking distance to buses, Lipscombe Park Kindergarten, trails, McAdam Square, Good Shepherd Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Only a short commute to Croydon Main Street and Train Station, Eastland and EastLink.
